title: Takes a while to get started
review: This one takes a bit to get going and funny, but once he starts, he keeps it going hard. Don't be afraid of the gay jokes, they lead to some funny moments and even funnier stories.

title: Great but...
review:
Whoever edited sound for this special needs to be fired! Ron White is hilarious as always but it sounds like Ron is using a boom mic while each and every audience member is hooked up with a lav mic. (Imagine you're watching a tv show and as soon as it goes to commercial, the audio becomes twice as loud to get your attention.)
That's what happens every few seconds when the crowd laughs. (Audience volume goes from a 5 to 10)
Normal volume when Ron is talking then audience laughter goes way too high!!
Ron White is hilarious as it is, there's no need for the unnatural volume with the laugh audio. 
Other than the audio, I recommend this

title: Pretty funny!
review: I liked it. Not as funny as "A little unprofessional" but still very good. The Golden Corral bit was hilarious.
